title: Polo Ralph Lauren 's workforce worldwide 2009 to 2019
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Number of employees has increased over the Year.
Number of employees is gradually increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2016, slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
The highest Number of employees, of value 26000.0 was reached at Year 2016
The lowest Number of employees, of value 17000.0 was reported at Year 2009
